statements: SELECT id, serial_number, description, location FROM assets;
SELECT description, location, serial_number, id FROM assets;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT id, serial_number FROM assets WHERE description LIKE '%laptop%';
SELECT serial_number, location FROM assets WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, description FROM assets WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY location DESC, description ASC;
SELECT id, location, description FROM assets WHERE description ILIKE '%laptop%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT id, serial_number FROM assets WHERE location IN ('Office','Storage') ORDER BY serial_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE location='New York';
SELECT asset_id, serial_number FROM assets WHERE description LIKE '%laptop%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_location='Office' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT asset_id, description FROM assets WHERE location='Warehouse' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT asset_id, description FROM assets WHERE serial_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT asset_id, description, location FROM assets WHERE asset_id IN (SELECT asset_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase');
SELECT asset_id, description, location FROM assets WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, asset_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE DATE(transaction_date) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT id, description FROM assets;
SELECT serial_number, location FROM assets WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, address FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, serial_number, description FROM assets WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, description, location FROM assets WHERE description LIKE '%laptop%';
SELECT assets.id, assets.serial_number, locations.name FROM assets JOIN asset_locations ON assets.id = asset_locations.asset_id JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = asset_locations.location_id;

SELECT locations.name, assets.serial_number, assets.description FROM locations JOIN asset_locations ON locations.location_id = asset_locations.location_id JOIN assets ON assets.id = asset_locations.asset_id WHERE locations.address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_id, serial_number, description FROM Asset WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM Asset GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM AssetHistory ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT a.asset_id, a.serial_number, l.name AS location_name FROM Asset a JOIN Location l ON a.location = l.name;
SELECT * FROM Asset WHERE description = 'Laptop' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, description, location FROM Asset WHERE location = 'Office' AND description LIKE '%Printer%';
SELECT a.asset_id, a.serial_number, a.description, l.name AS location_name FROM Asset a JOIN Location l ON a.location = l.location_id WHERE a.location = '2' AND l.city = 'New York';
SELECT a.asset_id, ah.location_id, ah.update_date, ah.notes FROM Asset a JOIN AssetHistory ah ON a.asset_id = ah.asset_id WHERE ah.update_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY ah.update_date DESC;

SELECT a.asset_id, a.serial_number, m.maintenance_date, m.description FROM Asset a JOIN Maintenance m ON a.asset_id = m.asset_id WHERE m.description ILIKE '%inspection%' AND m.maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, serial_number, location FROM assets WHERE location = 'Office A';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT asset_id, description FROM assets WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, serial_number, location FROM assets WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT asset_id, description, location FROM assets WHERE asset_id > 100 AND location != 'San Francisco';
SELECT a.asset_id, a.description, l.city, l.country FROM assets a JOIN locations l ON a.location = l.location_id;

SELECT u.username, a.serial_number, ah.action, ah.timestamp FROM users u JOIN user_assets ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN assets a ON ua.asset_id = a.asset_id JOIN asset_history ah ON a.asset_id = ah.asset_id ORDER BY ah.timestamp DESC;
